casebody.data:
LRC MAGIC INVESTORS
v.
BESSEMER GROUP, L.L.C. 2019-0350 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 18, 2019

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

Appellants have not filed a memorandum in support of jurisdiction, due April 15, 2019, in compliance with the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio and therefore have failed to prosecute this cause with the requisite diligence. Cause dismissed. Appellants' motion for immediate stay and appellee's motion to dismiss denied as moot.
